definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Many children are now born into or raised in one-parent families.
sentences.chinese: 现在很多孩子在单亲家庭中出生或成长。

sentences.english: Fedorova is an only child, and she was brought up by her mother and maternal grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 是单亲家庭的女儿，由母亲和外祖父祖母抚养长大。

sentences.english: They grew up in one-parent families or with stepmothers and stepfathers.
sentences.chinese: 他们在单亲家庭里长大或是继父继母带大的。

sentences.english: Many students came from single-parent families.
sentences.chinese: 许多的学生都来自单亲家庭。

sentences.english: The third part is the problem of single-parent students' education in primary school.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分为小学单亲家庭学生的学校教育问题。

sentences.english: He's a social worker responsible for helping children from single-parent families.
sentences.chinese: 他是个社工人员，专门帮助单亲家庭的小孩。

sentences.english: Some people nearby began to talk about things such as one-parent family and the like.
sentences.chinese: 附近的一些人开始谈论诸如单亲家庭这样的话题。

sentences.english: Due to the increasing divorce rate, there are more and more single parent households.
sentences.chinese: 由于离婚率上升，出现了越来越多的单亲家庭。

sentences.english: Figures of one-parent families are on the increase in Britain and the US.
sentences.chinese: 单亲家庭的数量在英国和美国在增长。

sentences.english: So we became a single parent family and money got really tight.
sentences.chinese: 于是我们家成了一个单亲家庭，日子过得捉襟见肘。

sentences.english: Generally specking, single-parent families would change the children's life.
sentences.chinese: 总的说来，单亲家庭可能改变孩子的一生。

sentences.english: The fourth part is the social education problem of single-parent family in primary school.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分小学单亲家庭学生的社会教育问题。

sentences.english: Another big factor of poverty is the ever-growing single parent's population.
sentences.chinese: 贫困的另一个重要因素就是日益增长的单亲家庭总数。

sentences.english: The number of completions of new single-family homes last year hit lows last seen in the second world war.
sentences.chinese: 去年单亲家庭房屋的配给数量是二战时期以来最低的。

sentences.english: Due to the increasing divorce rate , there are more and more single parent
sentences.chinese: 由于离婚率上升，出现了越来越多的单亲家庭。

definition: to value males and attach less importance to females (idiom)
(Internet slang) guy who grew up in the countryside and gained a foothold in the city through hard work
to have lost both one's parents
domestic violence/abbr. for 家庭暴力[jia1 ting2 bao4 li4]
